content: For the second fiscal quarter, we expect total revenue to be in the range of $51 million to $51.5 million, subscription revenue to be in the range of $37 million to $37.5 million, adjusted EBITDA to be in the range of $4 million to $4.5 million and non-GAAP EPS to be in the range of $0.06 to $0.08 per share based on a fully diluted share count of approximately 37.3 million shares. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question.
